To help you get a feel for what this online learning would be like, we have put together this¬†video about the basics of our online learning platform, UKCEH LEarnWorlds. (external link to YouTube) ¬† We also offer bespoke training courses at the time¬†of your choice.¬†From 6-20 learners. Please contact¬†Dr. Ingo Sch√ºder on 01491 69 2225 or 07395 845941or¬†UKCEHtraining@ceh.ac.uk¬†to explore further.
